title: PLAT LEVEL ONLY Looking for players
body:
My IGN is Arrabbiata, I am here looking to build a team.

Requirements are as follows:
- You must be PLATINUM TIER  no less, no more
- You must have a good KDA 3+ minimum on champions you are looking to play
- A good attitude, NO SALT. No flaming, No getting angry. We are here to learn together and build up our ranks together.
- You must be able to use Discord or Skype. Being able to communicate is very important!

I am looking for:
-TOP
-SUPPORT
-MID

You must have a decent champion pool that can match certain team compositions. I am not looking for a one trick pony. I am not expecting you to be able to play everything!

It is important for you to know your limits and capabilities within your lanes.

If you are interested please add me!
